closed_reason: Created close.go and reopen.go Cobra commands in cmd/tk/cmd/. close.go has --reason, --force, --json flags; reopen.go has --json flag. Added 'close' and 'reopen' to Cobra routing in main.go switch statement.
description: Migrate close (with reason argument) and reopen commands to Cobra subcommands.
title: Port close and reopen commands to Cobra
